title: Iran, Iraq what have we done and where does it end?
description:
Something i got from a friend i liked it a lot.

It\&#039;s about history, facts and it doesn\&#039;t have any conspiracies. 
What the hell have we done to Iraq in the past 40 years and next on the list is Iran. Pretty shocking if amateurs can make this what does that say about mainstream media and the way we are being bombarded with propaganda.

I can\&#039;t wait to see further episodes of this one, it starts out promising.

45 minutes total.

2 introductionary episodes about the orb investigation and other issues and than there\&#039;s episode 2 wich is an awesome 25 min summup of what we have done to Iraq and Iran.

There will be more episodes in the future.

I visited their youtube yesterday and i think these guys deserve a go at constructing a better quality version of their work they uploaded more than 100 clips in 2 months..

Go and support them if you are like me anti-war and bigotry.
